messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: 'On the morning of August 3rd, Joanna Mitchell’s name echoed in the MISSING REPORTS. Detective Jake Williams received the FIRST ALERT. Immediately, Officer Nancy Fields got the CALL. Sgt. Larry Coleman, following the PROTOCOLS, assembled the search battalion. Lt. George Harris threw a pointer - 'the nearby woods'. Detective Sarah Miller started her task, probing the FAMILY SECRETS. By noon, Officer Roger Smith, accompanied by his K9 sentinel, scouted the perimeter. Dr. Karen Blake, the grim coroner, stood by. Captain Peter Young faced the PRESS BULLETS in the evening, while in the shadows, Criminalist Mark Lane dug through the EVIDENCE from Mitchell’s haunting abode.'
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Detective Jake Williams Officer Context: Detective Jake Williams received the first alert about Ms. Joanna Mitchell's missing report. Officer Role: Detective  Officer Name: Officer Nancy Fields Officer Context: Officer Nancy Fields was called in immediately after Detective Jake Williams got the alert. Officer Role: Officer  Officer Name: Sgt. Larry Coleman Officer Context: Sgt. Larry Coleman organized a search team following protocols after Ms. Joanna Mitchell was reported missing. Officer Role: Sergeant  Officer Name: Lt. George Harris Officer Context: Lt. George Harris suggested searching the nearby woods for Ms. Joanna Mitchell. Officer Role: Lieutenant  Officer Name: Detective Sarah Miller Officer Context: Detective Sarah Miller began the task of investigating Ms. Joanna Mitchell's family. Officer Role: Detective  Officer Name: Officer Roger Smith Officer Context: Officer Roger Smith joined the search around noon with his K9 partner. Officer Role: Officer  Officer Name: Dr. Karen Blake Officer Context: Dr. Karen Blake was on standby in case the situation became more severe. Officer Role: Coroner  Officer Name: Captain Peter Young Officer Context: Captain Peter Young addressed the media with a press conference in the evening. Officer Role: Captain  Officer Name: Criminalist Mark Lane Officer Context: Criminalist Mark Lane analyzed potential evidence from Ms. Joanna Mitchell’s residence. Officer Role: Criminalist.
